paragraphs.zh-tw: "What I Will" I will not dance to your war drum. I will not lend my soul nor my bones to your war drum.
paragraphs.en: “我要的” 我不會隨你的戰鼓起舞 我不會出借我的靈魂身骨給你的戰鼓。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will not dance to that beating. I know that beat.
paragraphs.en: 我不會隨著那節奏翩翩起舞 我很清楚那節奏。

paragraphs.zh-tw: It is lifeless. I know intimately that skin you are hitting.
paragraphs.en: 沒有生命的節奏。 我内心清楚你敲擊的那張皮

paragraphs.zh-tw: It was alive once, hunted, stolen, stretched. I will not dance to your drummed-up war.
paragraphs.en: 從前是活著的 而被獵殺、被竊取 被綳緊。 鼓聲隆隆的戰爭，我不會隨之起舞

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will not pop, spin, break for you. I will not hate for you or even hate you.
paragraphs.en: 我不會爲了你躍進、迴旋或崩壞 我不會為你而恨 也不會恨你。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will not kill for you. Especially I will not die for you.
paragraphs.en: 我不會為你殺戮 我更不會為你而死。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will not mourn the dead with murder nor suicide. I will not side with you or dance to bombs because everyone is dancing.
paragraphs.en: 我不會自殺，不會跟兇手一起悼念死者 我不會支持你也不會隨炸彈起舞 只是因爲每個人都在跳舞。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Everyone can be wrong. Life is a right, not collateral or casual.
paragraphs.en: 每個人都會錯。 生命是權利，不是附屬品或臨時的收容。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will not forget where I come from. I will craft my own drum.
paragraphs.en: 我不會忘記我來自何方。 我會打造我自己的鼓

paragraphs.zh-tw: Gather my beloved near, and our chanting will be dancing. Our humming will be drumming.
paragraphs.en: 和我愛的人在一起 我們的歌頌是我們的舞 我們的低吟是我們的鼓

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will not be played. I will not lend my name nor my rhythm to your beat.
paragraphs.en: 沒有人可以主宰我 你的戰鼓下不會包含我的名字和節奏。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I will dance and resist and dance and persist and dance. This heartbeat is louder than death.
paragraphs.en: 我會起舞、抗拒、起舞、繼續、再起舞。 我的心跳比死亡還要響亮

paragraphs.zh-tw: Your war drum ain't louder than this breath. Haaa. What's up TED people? Let me hear you make some noise.
paragraphs.en: 你的戰鼓還比不過 這個呼吸聲。哈... TED的人們，怎麽了？讓我聼聼你的反應

paragraphs.zh-tw: A bunch of pacifists. Confused, aspiring pacifists.
paragraphs.en: 一票和平主義者 困惑的抱有大志的和平主義者

paragraphs.zh-tw: I understand. I've been wrong a lot lately.
paragraphs.en: 我懂。 最近以來我作錯很多

paragraphs.zh-tw: Like a lot. So I couldn't figure out what to read today.
paragraphs.en: 像很多。 所以我無法理出 今天要讀些什麽。

paragraphs.zh-tw: I mean, I've been saying I've been prepping. What that means is prepping my outfit, prepping options, trying to figure out what I'm coming behind and going in front of.
paragraphs.en: 我是說，我一直說我在預習 那是在說預習我的外觀 預習選項 試著去理清我離開了什麽 將要面對什麽。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Poetry does that. It preps you. It aims you.
paragraphs.en: 詩可以 讓人做好準備。讓人找到目標。

paragraphs.zh-tw: So I am going to read a poem that was chosen just now. But I'm going to need you to just sit for like 10 minutes and hold a woman who is not here.
paragraphs.en: 所以接下來我要讀一首詩 一首剛剛選的詩 但是我會需要你 好好的坐10分鐘 抱著一個不在這裡的女人

paragraphs.zh-tw: Hold her now with you. You don't need to say her name out loud, you can just hold her.
paragraphs.en: 現在就抱她 靠緊你。 你不需要說出她的名字，只需抱著她。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Are you holding her? This is "Break Clustered." All holy history banned. Unwritten books predicted the future, projected the past.
paragraphs.en: 你在抱她嗎？ 這是“打破集束（炸彈）“ 所有神聖的歷史都禁止。 不成文的書預測了未來，影射了過去

paragraphs.zh-tw: But my head unwraps around what appears limitless, man's creative violence. Whose son shall it be? Which male child will perish a new day? Our boys' deaths galvanize.
paragraphs.en: 然而我的頭打開了 那看起來永無止境 人們富創意的暴力。 那是誰的兒子？ 誰家的男孩在這新的一天要死亡？ 為我們孩子們的死亡鍍銀

paragraphs.zh-tw: We cherish corpses. We mourn women, complicated.
paragraphs.en: 我們珍惜屍體 我們哀悼女人，複雜。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Bitches get beat daily. Profits made, prophets ignored.
paragraphs.en: 壞女人天天被打 先知被創造、被忽略

paragraphs.zh-tw: War and tooth, enameled salted lemon childhoods. All colors run, none of us solid.
paragraphs.en: 戰爭和傷痛裝飾了鹹鹹檸檬般的童年 所有的顔色失真，所有的我們脆弱

paragraphs.zh-tw: Don't look for shadow behind me. I carry it within. I live cycles of light and darkness.
paragraphs.en: 不必在我身後找尋背影。我一直帶著。 我活在光明和黑暗的周期

paragraphs.zh-tw: Rhythm is half silence. I see now, I never was one and not the other.
paragraphs.en: 節奏的一半是寂靜。 我現在懂了，我從未是一個，也不是另一個。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Sickness, health, tender violence. I think now I never was pure.
paragraphs.en: 生病，健康，溫柔的暴力。 我現在認爲我從未純潔。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Before form I was storm, blind, ign'ant -- still am. Human contracted itself blind, malignant.
paragraphs.en: 在成型以前我是風暴 盲目、無知—如今仍是 人們和盲目、惡意結夥

paragraphs.zh-tw: I never was pure. Girl spoiled before ripened.
paragraphs.en: 我從未是純潔的 女孩們在成熟前就被摧殘

paragraphs.zh-tw: Language can't math me. I experience exponentially.
paragraphs.en: 你無法用言語來計算我 我經歷了對數平方的事

paragraphs.zh-tw: Everything is everything. One woman loses 15, maybe 20, members of her family.
paragraphs.en: 一切是一切 一個女人家裏死了15或20個人

paragraphs.zh-tw: One woman loses six. One woman loses her head.
paragraphs.en: 一個女人死了6個 一個女人失去頭顱

paragraphs.zh-tw: One woman searches rubble. One woman feeds on trash. One woman shoots her face. One woman shoots her husband.
paragraphs.en: 一個女人找尋碎石。一個女人撿食垃圾。 一個女人開槍射自己的臉。一個女人射自己的丈夫。

paragraphs.zh-tw: One woman straps herself. One woman gives birth to a baby.
paragraphs.en: 一個女人用皮帶捆綁自己 一個女人生了一個小孩。

paragraphs.zh-tw: One woman gives birth to borders. One woman no longer believes love will ever find her.
paragraphs.en: 一個女人畫出新界綫 一個女人不再相信愛會再來

paragraphs.zh-tw: One woman never did. Where do refugee hearts go? Broken, dissed, placed where they're not from, don't want to be missed.
paragraphs.en: 一個女人從沒相信過愛。 流亡者的心都到哪去了？ 碎了，分崩離析 被放在不是故鄉的地方，不想被思念。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Faced with absence. We mourn each one or we mean nothing at all.
paragraphs.en: 面無表情的臉孔 我們為彼此哀悼 或者這根本不代表什麽。

paragraphs.zh-tw: My spine curves spiral. Precipice running to and running from human beings.
paragraphs.en: 我的脊椎迴旋 危境在人間忽隱忽現

paragraphs.zh-tw: Cluster bombs left behind. De facto landmines.
paragraphs.en: 集束炸彈留下了 現在的地雷

paragraphs.zh-tw: A smoldering grief. Harvest contaminated tobacco.
paragraphs.en: 暗自燃燒的悲傷。 收集污染煙草

paragraphs.zh-tw: Harvest bombs. Harvest baby teeth.
paragraphs.en: 收集炸彈 收集嬰孩牙齒

paragraphs.zh-tw: Harvest palms, smoke. Harvest witness, smoke.
paragraphs.en: 收集斷掌，煙霧 收集證人，煙霧

paragraphs.zh-tw: Resolutions, smoke. Salvation, smoke.
paragraphs.en: 決議文，煙霧 救世，煙霧

paragraphs.zh-tw: Redemption, smoke. Breathe.
paragraphs.en: 償還，煙霧。 吸氣

paragraphs.zh-tw: Do not fear what has blown up. If you must, fear the unexploded.
paragraphs.en: 別害怕 已經爆炸的 如果真的要的話 那麽就害怕未爆炸的吧。

paragraphs.zh-tw: Thank you.
paragraphs.en: 謝謝大家

title: Suheir Hammad Poems Of War Peace Women Power
